message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $150.  Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet in the middle at $110? I'd be willing to go up to that price
